channel.title: Basic coding help needed
channel.description:
Hello, i just need some quick basic coding help.
1. How do i make an item on the frame (such as a quest) make a pop-up menu? 2. How do i change the color of fonts on the frame 3. How do i change what NPC's yell out 4. How do i change the color of the items (font) 5. How do i change/edit/add the things that are being automatically yelled out in the chat every like 5 seconds or so.
Thanks for your help, don't post and be like, "noob!", "go learn to code"! Flamers not welcome.

item.title: Basic coding help needed
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

  1. add this type of thing.
    sendQuest(“title”, 8144);
    clearQuestInterface();
    sendQuest(“text”, 8145);
    sendQuest(“text”, 8147);
    sendQuest(“text”, 8148);
    sendQuestSomething(8143);
    showInterface(8134);
    flushOutStream();
    //add more numbers for a longer menu

2)Find the frame text in client and just change the @gre@ or whatever is in front of it

3)search for the text in npchandler.java and just change it.

4)client sided, if you use silab or mopar you won’t be able to change this.

5)client.java, search and change.

Read full topic

item.title: Basic coding help needed
item.dc:creator: @Sun_Burner Sun Burner
item.description:
@Sun_Burner wrote:

Thanks Chassy, i now know how to change what the NPC’s yell out, although i don’t get where i put the “@red@Hello” thing

Read full topic

item.title: Basic coding help needed
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

To change the color of the text you do like:

@red@Hello!

That will make it red like Hello!

TO make Npcs yell out, search for what they say by doing Ctrl + F in NPCHandler.java, and change it. Dont remove the quotes that they have around them.

For 5, try searching in client.java for what it says and change that? Not sure, hope I helped at all.

Read full topic
